OOC: I don't like that Perceptor/Blindfear niether Nightstrike being 
destroyed.

Perceptor:

Perceptor opened comm link with Decepticons "Perceptor to 
Decepticon's base do you copy... I feel that a small base is around, 
I think that it's a good chance to take prisioners in order to 
exchance them by ramsom... or become them slaves forever..."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> ooC: Anyone who has decepticons and doesn't want them to die, 
please 
> speak up now cause Firestrike's about to go on a rampage.
> 
> 
> --- Switchblade ---
> 
> Switchblade smirks, "Welcome Firestrike, soon, you will smite any 
> who oppose me. You will note that on the inside of your arm there 
is 
> a new compartment, and inside that compartment, is a new, and 
> exceptionally destructive weapon. Use it to crush the infidels. You 
> can destroy Soundwave, Rumble, Frenzy, Spasstik, and Astrotrain as 
> soon as you find them, anyone else should be given the choice of 
> living or dying."
> 
> Switchblade picks up a little remote control, and rips a paper from 
> the wall to reveal a vid screen. He presses a few buttons, and a 
> picture of the control room appears. "Here are the first targets, 
> go!" Switchblade dusts off his hands, then sits back in a reclining 
> armchair that was sitting in the corner of the room.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers@t... wrote:
> > Firestrike awoke, slowly pulling light through his
> > optics.  
> > Adjustments, perfect, Vision 100%.  The bot raised
> > it's torso, then 
> > flexed his arms.  "Excellent"  voice thought inside
> > him.  "You will 
> > be silent," another said "I hold control ove this body
> > now, not you 
> > Blade." There was no reply. 
> > 
> > "SwitchBlade" he said as the bot stood and towered
> > over him.  
> > "Firestrike, for duty"
